context: F5 led the Overall Application Security & Delivery market with 21% market share and dominated ADC market with 42% share in 2024. The company transitioned heavily to software and subscription models (58% of product revenue). Market driven by hybrid/multi-cloud architectures and enterprise AI applications. F5 competed across ADC, WAF, API protection, and cloud-native security.

competitors.name: Akamai
competitors.notes: Ranked #2 in Overall Application Security & Delivery market, strong in CDN and edge security

competitors.name: Cloudflare
competitors.notes: Ranked #3 in market, leading cloud-native web infrastructure and security provider

competitors.name: NetScaler (Citrix)
competitors.notes: Ranked #2 in ADC market and #4 overall, strong application delivery controller competitor

competitors.name: A10 Networks
competitors.notes: Ranked #3 in ADC market, high-performance application delivery and DDoS protection

competitors.name: Cisco Systems
competitors.notes: Comprehensive networking and cybersecurity with strong enterprise relationships

competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks
competitors.notes: Leading next-generation firewall and cloud security platform

competitors.name: AWS
competitors.notes: Elastic Load Balancer (68.15% load balancer market share), WAF, and cloud-native application services

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure
competitors.notes: Azure Application Gateway (9.21% market share), Azure Front Door, and integrated cloud services

competitors.name: Fortinet
competitors.notes: Web Application Firewall and integrated security fabric solutions
